-Lunarpine understood what Piston was saying "for a bot to be 
adjusted they send someone similar to do it" PIston nodded yes.

"So if a peacefull naturalist came here then another one would trane 
them?" Again piston nodded yes.

Lunarpine saw this as a chance to find Shadow Wings spark but was 
inturupted. "Don't think it " Pistons voice rang out. Lunarpine knew 
that thought and communication were one here, he could sense every 
bot around one of them had to be Wing. "How do you communicate 
directly with me?" he asked 
"I'm your focus point, you see me as I was because I focused on you 
directly." Piston let his gaurd down, sudenly he sensed why the 
former wolfbot was asking. "No don't" he cried trying to prevent the 
obvious

Lunarpines form glowed brightly as he focused his energy he'd just 
realised he was IN the matrix but it took adjustment to be WITH the 
matrix.

He rached his thoughts out to Shadow Wing hoping her adjustor hadn't 
gotten to her yet.

"Wing Can You Sense Me?

(And the award for the best post in an RPG goes to drumroll please)
